text:
[Verse]
Sunshine in your eyes
Waves crash by your side
Our laughter in the air
We don't have a care

[Verse 2]
Flip-flops on your feet
Melting in the heat
Ice cream in our hands
Sharing summer plans

[Chorus]
Feel the summer breeze
Dance with me please
Underneath the sky
Time just flies by

[Verse 3]
Beach ball in the sand
Walking hand in hand
Feeling so alive
In this moment thrive

[Verse 4]
Sunset paints the sea
Just you and me
Stars begin to show
Hearts start to glow

[Bridge]
Memories we'll keep
When the nights are deep
Days that never end
With my best friend
title: Summer Breeze
